title: The Blood Mage
description: On his sixteenth birthday, Tom triggered strange new magical abilities. When his sister is kidnapped, he discovers he was the intended target. A community of magical villains is after him because he may be the Last Blood Mage. Will Tom embrace his new destiny?The Blood Mage is the first in a new YA series. It's a spinoff of The Evers Series, but new readers do not need to have read the series to enjoy the book.
author: Marie-Hélène Lebeault
